about_the_game:
In the mystical world of the Slavs, where ancient gods and magic reign, dark times have begun. Mythical monsters, sent by the spirits of nature, attack the Slavic tribes, eager to wipe them off the face of the earth.

Gameplay

In this two-dimensional strategy, you take on the role of a great leader, gathering an army of brave heroes and wise shamans. Your task is to defend
their lands and find a balance between combat power and the well-being of the settlement.
Every decision has consequences: throw more warriors into battle or make a sacrifice to receive magical help? Your strategy will determine the fate of your village. Rise to the heights of glory or fall at the hands of bloodthirsty monsters.
You can tame animals to improve your settlement. A horse will allow you to move faster and create carts, as well as create new units. The bull will help on the farm and the boar can be sacrificed to the gods.
